content: संवर्तः {@--1@} Turning towards. {@--2@} Dissolution, destruction. {@--3@} The periodical destruction of the world; <ls>Mv. 6. 26.</ls> {@--4@} A cloud. {@--5@} A cloud of a particular class (abounding in water). {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of one of the seven clouds that rise at the dissolution of the world. {@--7@} A year. {@--8@} A collection, multitude.
